name: Golden Hour (JBrosDev)
description:
GOLDEN HOUR

A 2D Platformer game. 

PLAY THE WEB VERSION HERE

Controls: 

  • Move - AWSD; Up, Down, Left, Right;
  •  Jump - Space Bar;
  •  Sprint - Shift;
  •  Attack - left Ctrl; Left mouse button;
  •  Restart - R;
  •  Main Menu - M; 

I got these from the Unity Asset store 

  1. Enemy Galore 1 - Pixel Art [Admurin]
  2. Free 2D Mega Pack [Brackeys]
  3. Knight Sprite Sheet (free) [Kin Ng]
  4. Free Pixel Art Hill [Eder]
